OrgName: Warner Music Inc. and its US recorded music affiliates that are wholly owned by WMG Acquisition Corp.
activities: WMG receives and processes customer personal information from its affiliates in the EU to execute customer requests, market related products and services on behalf of WMG affiliates, and carry out internal administrative functions associated with these activities.
